description:
Metaplay is proclaiming the beginning of a “Game Development Renaissance,” heralding a new era of growth, innovation, and operational excellence driven by advances in technology, fresh approaches to creativity, and better tools and strategies. Like the Renaissance centuries ago – which propelled leaps in art, science, and productivity – this modern iteration is creating limitless... Read more »

The post Metaplay: Game development is entering a ‘Renaissance’ appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Metaplay: Game development is entering a ‘Renaissance’
